name: PolicyPal Pte Ltd
description: Operator of an insurance brokerage platform intended to rebuild the user insurance experience through a digitalized approach. The company enables users to start their financial journey through gamified reward-based learning and offers travel, pet, term life and motor insurance along with offering policy management, financial portfolio management, purchase of policies and bite-sized information, thereby empowering customers to make the right choice for their financial and protection needs, with affordable financial products.
one_liner: Operator of an insurance brokerage platform intended to rebuild the user insurance experience through a digitalized approach.
